00029 bool INISetComment(const char commentchar)
00030 {
00031     switch(commentchar)
00032     {
00033         //Can't set to any character that is already used for something else.
00034         case ' ':
00035         case '\t':
00036         case 10:
00037         case 13:
00038         case '[':
00039         case ']':
00040         case '\0': 
00041             return false;
00042             break;
00043         default:
00044         {
00045             if(commentchar == miniini_private::namevalsep)
00046             {
00047                 return false;
00048             }
00049             miniini_private::comment = commentchar;
00050             return true;
00051         }
00052         break;
00053     }
00054 }
00055 
00056 bool INISetSeparator(const char sep)
00057 {
00058     switch(sep)
00059     {
00060         //Can't set to any character that is already used for something else.
00061         case ' ':
00062         case '\t':
00063         case 10:
00064         case 13:
00065         case '[':
00066         case ']':
00067         case '\0':
00068             return false;
00069             break;
00070         default:
00071         {
00072             if(sep == miniini_private::comment)
00073             {
00074                 return false;
00075             }
00076             miniini_private::namevalsep = sep;
00077             return true;
00078         }
00079         break;
00080     }
00081 }
